original_text: I will make your tongue stick to the roof of your mouth so that you will be silent and unable to rebuke them, for they are a rebellious people.
korean_text: 내가 네 혀를 네 입천장에 붙게 하여 네가 말 못하는 자가 되어 그들을 꾸짖는 자가 되지 못하게 하리니 그들은 패역한 족속임이니라

sentences.original_text: I will make your tongue stick to the roof of your mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 혀를 네 입 천장에 붙게 하리니

sentences.original_text: so that you will be silent
for they are a rebellious people
